label.value: organism species detection objective

definition.value: A biological feature identification objective to identify the organism species in a specimen.

label.value: organism species detection assay

definition.value: An organism detection assay that identifies the organism species in a specimen.

label.value: sequence annotation algorithm

definition.value: An algorithm used to identify sequence features (e.g. protein coding regions) in the assembled contig sequence.  This may also include a description of any manual curation that may have generated or validated the annotation.

label.value: Bioinformatics Resource Center

definition.value: An organization that  is one of the Internet-based research centers established and funded by NIAID (the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases). The Bioinformatics Resource Centers (BRCs) were formed in response to the threats posed by emerging and re-emerging pathogens, particularly CDC Category A, B, and C pathogens, and their potential use in bioterrorism. The intention of NIAID in funding these bioinformatics centers is to assist researchers involved in the experimental characterization of such pathogens and the formation of drugs, vaccines, or diagnostic tools to combat them.

label.value: country name

definition.value: A textual entity that denotes a geographic location that is a site or part of a site that is identified as a country in the political geography.

label.value: investigation identifier

definition.value: A CRID symbol used to identify an investigation.

label.value: grant identifier

definition.value: A CRID symbol used to identify a grant.

label.value: analytical chromatography

definition.value: An analyte assay that uses a biomaterial's preferential affinity for either the mobile phase or the stationary phase to separate it from other materials and thereby detect its presence in an input material.

label.value: electron microscopy imaging assay

definition.value: An imaging assay in which an electrons are used to probe the density, shape and composition of an input material which are detected in an electron microscope and utilized to produce an image of the material.

label.value: immuno staining assay

definition.value: A assay detecting a molecular label assay in which the label is attached to an antibody so that substances are marked based on the antibody's binding specificity.

label.value: purified material

definition.value: A material entity that is generated by a purification process in which an input material is separated to obtain a fraction with a higher concentration of a desired component

label.value: calorimetric binding assay

definition.value: A binding assay in which the heat generated or absorbed during a binding event is measured, which allows determination of binding constants, reaction stoichiometry, enthalpy and entropy.

label.value: antibody binding detection by fluorescence quenching

definition.value: A binding assay in which affinity is measured by detecting a change in fluorescence (usually quenching) that occurs upon binding of the antibody to the ligand. The fluorescent signal that is affected by binding is either from an exogenous fluorophore attached to the ligand, or is the intrisic fluorescence of aromatic (tryptophan) residues on the binding site of the antibody (no conjugated fluorophore necessary) or, less commonly, on the ligand binding region (epitope).

label.value: grant

definition.value: A plan specification of organization A to give money to organization B so that B conducts investigations. Organization A has funder role and Organization B has research organization role.

label.value: antigen inhibition assay measuring the dissociation constant [KD] of a B cell epitope:antibody complex approximated by IC50

definition.value: A B cell epitope equilibrium dissociation constant (KD) assay that provides IC50 values determined under assay conditions where the IC50 approximates a KD value using a B cell epitope antigen inhibition of binding assay.

label.value: assay measuring epitope specific Ig-mediated histamine release

definition.value: A B cell epitope specific activation of additional immune response assay that detects histamine release in vitro.

label.value: assay measuring epitope specific immunoglobulin-mediated antigen activation

definition.value: A B cell epitope dependent biological activity determination assay that detects antigen activation.

label.value: assay measuring epitope specific complement-dependent cytotoxicity

definition.value: A B cell epitope specific activation of additional immune response assay that detects complement-dependent cytotoxicity in vitro .

label.value: assay measuring epitope specific antibody-dependent cellular cytotoxicity

definition.value: A B cell epitope specific activation of additional immune response assay that detects antibody-dependent cellular cytotoxicity in vitro.

label.value: assay measuring epitope specific immunoglobulin-mediated neutralization

definition.value: A B cell epitope dependent biological activity determination assay that detects neutralization of the antigen.

label.value: assay measuring epitope specific opsonization

definition.value: A B cell epitope specific activation of additional immune response assay that detects opsonization in vitro .

label.value: calorimetry assay measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: A calorimetric binding assay that detects the binding of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: electron microscopy assay determining the 3D structure of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: An electron-microscopy 3D molecular structure determination assay that characterizes the 3-dimensional molecular structrue of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

label.value: NMR assay determining the 3D structure of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: A nuclear magnetic resonance 3D molecular structure determination assay that characterizes the 3-dimensional structure of a B cell epitope:antibody complex.

label.value: cross blocking assay measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: A cross-blocking assay that detects the binding of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: RIA measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: A radio immuno assay that detects the binding of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: immunoblot assay measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: An immunoblot assay that detects the binding of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: plasmon resonance assay measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: A surface plasmon resonance binding assay that detects the binding of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: immuno staining assay measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: An immuno staining assay that detects the binding of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: immunoprecipitation assay measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: An immunoprecipitation assay that detects the binding of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: mass spectrometry assay measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: A mass spectrometry assay that detects the binding of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: phage display assay measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: A phage display binding assay that detects the binding of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: electron microscopy assay measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: An electron microscopy imaging assay that detects the binding of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: ELISA measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: An enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay that detects the binding of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: ELISPOT assay measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: An enzyme-linked immunospot assay that detects the binding of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: flow cytometry assay measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: A flow cytometry assay that detects the binding of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: intracellular material detection assay measuring epitope specific granzyme A release by T cells

definition.value: A flow cytometry assay that detects epitope specific granzyme A release by T cells.

label.value: chromatography assay measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: An analytical chromatography assay that detects the binding of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: NMR assay measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: A B cell epitope qualitative binding to antibody assay that uses a nuclear magnetic resonance assay.

label.value: ELISA measuring epitope specific granulysin release by T cells

definition.value: An enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay that detects epitope specific granulysin release by T cells.

label.value: intracellular material detection assay measuring epitope specific granulysin release by T cells

definition.value: A flow cytometry assay that detects epitope specific granulysin release by T cells.

label.value: fluorescence detection assay measuring binding off rate [koff] to determine direct binding of a cell-bound-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A fluorescence detection assay that measures binding off rate [koff] to detect direct binding of a cell-bound-MHC molecule with a ligand.

label.value: fluorescence detection assay measuring binding on rate [kon] to determine direct binding of a cell-bound-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A fluorescence detection assay that measures binding on rate (kon) to detect direct binding of a cell-bound-MHC molecule with a ligand.

label.value: fluorescence detection assay measuring equilibrium dissociation constant [KD] to determine competitive binding of a purified-MHC:ligand complex approximated by IC50

definition.value: A fluorescence detection assay that measures equilibrium dissociation constant (KD) to detect the loss of binding of a known reference ligand to purified-MHC due to competition by the ligand under investigation and provides IC50 values determined under assay conditions where the IC50 approximates a KD value.

label.value: split-ubiquitin assay

definition.value: A binding assay that screens membrane soluble proteins by fusion of two integral membrane proteins (bait and prey) to two different ubiquitin moieties. One moiety is also fused to a transcription factor (TF) that can be cleaved off by ubiquitin specific proteases. Upon bait and prey interaction, Nub and Cub-moieties assemble, reconstituting the split-ubiquitin. The reconstituted split-ubiquitin molecule is recognized by ubiquitin specific proteases, which cleave off the reporter protein, allowing it to induce the transcription of reporter genes.

label.value: far-western blot assay

definition.value: An assay that measures protein-protein interactions by separating target proteins on an SDS-PAGE gel, transfering them to a solid substrate, hybridizing with a protein probe and visualizing bound proteins using a probe-directed antibody. This is a adaptation on the western blot assay.

label.value: RNA protection assay

definition.value: An assay that determines the presence and estimates abundance of transcript species by first creating an homo or heteroduplex by adding a specific, complementary sequence to the sequence of interest and then exposing the mixture of ribonuclease, which will degrade only single stranded molecules. A detection step will reveal if the sample contained a sequence of interest.

label.value: electrophoretic mobility shift assay

definition.value: An assay that measures information about Protein-DNA or Protein-RNA interactions using gel electrophoresis and relying on the fact the molecular interactions will cause the heterodimer to be retarded on the gel when compared to controls corresponding to protein extract alone and protein extract + neutral nucleic acid.

label.value: gene knock-down assay

definition.value: An assay which transiently disrupts gene transcripts by expressing antisense RNA constructs or delivering RNA interfering molecules in cells.

label.value: nano-cap analysis of gene expression assay

definition.value: A transcription profiling assay that is performed using a very low amount (nanogram scale) of mRNA samples using Cap analysis gene expression (CAGE).
